mapper.select: select m.perms from tb_yofishdk_auth_role r left join tb_yofishdk_auth_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join tb_yofishdk_auth_user u on(u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join tb_yofishdk_auth_role_menu rm on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join tb_yofishdk_auth_menu m on(m.menu_id = rm.menu_id and m.type = 1 ) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null

select t1.menu_id as menuId, t1.parent_id as parentId, t1.menu_name as menuName, t1.url as url, t1.perms as perms , t1.icon as icon , t1.order_num as orderNum, t2.role_ids as roleIds from tb_yofishdk_auth_menu t1 left join ( select menu_id, listagg(role_id,',') within group (order by role_id) as role_ids from tb_yofishdk_auth_role_menu group by menu_id )t2 on t1.menu_id = t2.menu_id where t1.type = 0 start with t1.PARENT_ID = 0 connect by t1.PARENT_ID = prior t1.MENU_ID order siblings by t1.order_num asc
